item.description:
This is a multi-group meetup event. Please do not double/triple RSVP!

Our last Laser Tag meetup of 2012... and by request we're doing it on a Saturday night!

Make no mistake, this is not like the Laser Tag game of your childhood. This is a huge gaming area in a huge arena, and the guns have power ups and rechargeable ammo... plus they give you a scoresheet with all of your stats at the end of each game. They not only have a two floor battle zone, but also an arcade and a cafe area. Yes, we do have fun...

Afterwards, we'll go to a nearby restaurant for some post-game carbs. Sea Dog Brew Pub has been a recent favorite. We may need to cap the number of attendees so make sure you don't get left out!

 

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW

  • We have a reservation for a least two games: one at 7:45pm, and another at 8:45pm. But you can only play one if you want. Tonight is "all you can play night" so there's no limit on how many games you can do. Admission to play is $23. Here's the price list.
  • We'll be standing by the front entrance from 7:15pm - 7:30pm. At 7:30pm we are going to check-in for the 7:45pm game. If you don't make it in time, you'll have to come in and find us, or wait until 8:45pm for next game. So be sure to make it on time!
  • Although there is no running in Laser Tag, you will get hot and thirsty, and get a good workout Make sure you are wearing layers so that you can take off clothes or change if need be. Sneakers are a must. Don't say we didn't warn ya!
  • I am putting down a deposit for Saturday night so I would appreciate it if you RSVP only if you are a strong YES. I need an accurate headcount for the venue -- so be respectful with your RSVP please.

 

HOW TO GET THERE

Laser Craze is off of Route 93 in Woburn. If you haven't been to this location before, be aware that there is only a sign by the road that marks the building -- you have to go to the rear of the building to find the LaserCraze entrance (that's where we'll be).

By Subway :

Laser Craze is about a mile from the Anderson/Woburn stop on the Commuter Rail ( Lowell Line). If you need a ride, please mention it in your RSVP, and we'll see if someone can pick you up.

By Car :

From The North or South

  • Take Route I-93 to Exit 37C toward Commerce Way / Atlantic Avenue.
  • At the traffic light, turn right onto Presidential Way.
  • Travel .7 miles (through one traffic light).
  • Look for the LaserCraze entrance on the left at 15 Presidential Way. Go to the rear of the building to find the entrance.

From The East or West

  • Take Route I-95 (also known as Route 128) to Exit 37B to merge onto I-93 N toward Concord NH.
  • Take Route I-93 to Exit 37C toward Commerce Way / Atlantic Avenue.
  • At the traffic light, turn right onto Presidential Way.
  • Travel .7 miles (through one traffic light).
  • Look for the LaserCraze entrance on the left at 15 Presidential Way.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the entrance until 7:30pm. Afterwards, you'll have to find us inside. Be there by 7:30pm!
item.name: Laser Tag!
